physical_appearance: This is an embroidered choli. It is a cropped yellow blouse, with embroidered cross stitch motif along the chest and embroided floral designs along the sleeves. There is a pair of embroidered men on each side panel.
sgcool_label_text: This embroidered blouse would have been worn by a woman of the Kutchi Jain community. It features a cross-stitch like motif across the sleeves and chest, with a pair of embroidered English gentlement embroidered on to the side panels on either side.
subject_terms_1: folk costume embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) crosses (motif) tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments)
